text: Steady Advance||
Steady||Improves the unit's ability to defend at the cost of their mobility.
Force Concentration||Target friendly units to greatly improve their offensive capabilities and make their morale unbreakable for an extended period. Can only be used once per battle.
Ramming Speed!||Increases the speed of a ship in order to cause greater damage when it hits the enemy.
Taunt Group||
Precision Shot||Improved missile weapon damage for an extended period. These values are further modified by the unit itself.
Inspire Group||Your general improves the combat skills of friendly units within his area of influence for a short time.
Frenzy||Improves a unit's attack capabilities for an extended period of time.
Herd & Slaughter||A circular formation which allows entities in but not out. All entities within the formation are exposed to a devastating damage AOE.
Castled Sailing Ship||This ship is a tall and towering sailing ship with fore-and-aft castle, a veritable floating fortress.
Arena - Raise Shields||The casting unit raises their shields increasing their missile deflection chance.

Arena - Single Dismount||Actions a cavalry unit to dismount from their horses, becoming a melee infantry unit. This is an irreversible action as the horses will instant route after dismount is executed.
Oared Ship||This ship is a low-decked oared ship, her crews and rowers open and vulnerable to any missile attacks
Brace Ranks||Unit applies a braced stance which negates charge bonus and reflects an initial attack.
Sailing Ship||This ship is a high-decked sailing ship, her height gives it advantage against enemy boarders.
Castled Oared Ship||This ship is an oared ship with raised fighting platform to gain higher ground advantage.
Stationary Testudo||The troops of this unit raise their shields above their heads in a static defensive formation.

Relentless||Your general slightly improves the offensive capabilities of all units whilst removing their fatigue temporarily. Can only be used once per battle.

Kill Elephants||Elephant drivers will kill their mounts with spikes. To be used only if they run amok.
Flying Wedge||The unit moves into a flying wedge-shaped attack formation.
Second Wind||Target a friendly unit to remove any fatigue they may have.
Scare||Reduces the morale of an enemy unit for an extended period of time.

Shield Wall||The unit moves into a close formation and raises shields.
War Cry Group||Reduces the morale of enemy units within your general's area of influence for a short time.
Unity of the Tribes||Your general slightly improves the morale of all units for an extended period. Can only be used once per battle.

Push||Target an enemy unit to reduce their defense against charges and melee defence for a short time.
Fast Charge||Target friendly units to improve their speed and charge for an extended period. Can only be used once per battle.
Sea Sickness||As these men are inexperienced sailors. Caught up in sea combat, they suffer various penalties.
Square||The unit moves into a close square formation. Note that it cannot move whilst this ability is active.

Brace||Target friendly units to improve their resistance against charges for a short time.
Stampede||Charges are more effective for an extended time.

Pride||Your general greatly improves the effectiveness of a nearby unit's armour piercing capability. Can only be used once per battle.
Cavalry Counter-Tactics||Improves unit's damage against cavalry for an extended time.
Unbreakable||The unit's morale cannot be broken for an extended period of time.

Rally||Improves morale for friendly units within your general's area of influence.

Poor Stamina||The unit may be a natural sprinter very dangerous over close distances, but will quickly wasted on cross-country
Average Stamina||The unit has the average stamina fighting men usually has.

Slavic Wrath||Svarog forged weapons of iron, that our enemies might be crushed. Available to all Slavic units once the Fiery Shrine of Svarog wonder is built. Gives bonuses to units' melee attack and defence.
Stealth of the Hunter||Like the wolf, we stalk our enemies before the deathblow. Gives increased range to Slavic missile units for a short period of time.

Spirit of the Wolf||The foe feels our savage spirit before a single blow has been struck. Available to all Slavic units once the Temple of the Blazing Wolves wonder is built. Causes -20 morale penalty for all enemy units.

Last Stand||Men born of the forge are hardier and more resolute. Available to all Slavic units in a province containing a religious building dedicated to Perun. Units are immovable for 2 minutes, their morale becomes unbreakable, their fatigue is cancelled out, and bonuses to melee attack and defence are given.
Infantry Wedge||Break on through to the other side. The unit moves into a wedge-shaped attack formation.
Good Stamina||The unit does not tire easily, and able to fight on longer without losing their breath.
Excellent Stamina||The unit has excellent endurance, natural marathon runners able to traverse cross country or keep fresh in combat to outlast their foes.
